SqlCmd.name: SearchGoodsByName
SqlCmd.CmdLine: select good.Code,good.Name as GoodsName,good.Numbers as StockNum,info.SalePrice as Price from Tb_Goods good left join Tb_GoodsInfo info on good.Id=info.GoodsId where 1=1 @whereStr

SqlCmd.name: GetUserCartgoInfo
SqlCmd.CmdLine: select userid as Ssid, stockCode as StockCode, goods.name as GoodsName, BuyCnt, CurPrice, BuyCnt*CurPrice as TotalPrice from Tb_CartGo cartgo left join Tb_Goods goods on cartgo.StockCode=goods.code where IsPay!=1 and cartgo.userid='@ssid'

SqlCmd.name: RmUserCartgo
SqlCmd.CmdLine: delete from Tb_CartGo where userid='@ssid' and stockCode='@code';

SqlCmd.name: SubmitOrder
SqlCmd.CmdLine: update Tb_CartGo set IsPay=1,OrderId='@orderId' where userid='@ssid'

SqlCmd.name: GeTbOrdersNotSend
SqlCmd.CmdLine: select order1.*,go.StockCode ,go.BuyCnt,go.CurPrice,goods.Name from Tb_Order order1 left join Tb_CartGo go on order1.OrderId=go.OrderId left JOIN Tb_Goods goods on goods.Code=go.StockCode where ifnull(order1.IsSend,0)=0;

SqlCmd.name: UpdateTbOrdersSend
SqlCmd.CmdLine: update Tb_Order set IsSend=1 where orderid='@orderId';
